casebody.data:
Jamie E. PRINCE, Widow of Mark Randall Prince, Sr., Deceased Employee, Plaintiff,
v.
UNDERGROUND CONSTRUCTION CO., INC., Employer, Allied Eastern Indemnity Company, Carrier (Eastern Alliance Insurance Group, Third-Party Administrator), Defendants. No. COA17-1195 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: May 15, 2018

DISMISSED.
